Title: Tracing to Event Viewer or Text file logs _ Community
Author: Christian Hauggaard
Text: When tracing is activated, theDeployment and Executioninformation is logged in the Event Viewer or in a Text file which can be used to troubleshoot issues. Tools Options General Open log file Tools Options General tracelog.txt UserAccount version Open log file Tools Options General

Lists.heading: Where to find the trace logs?
list: Select Open EventViewer under Tools -> Options -> General tab to review the Event Viewer Application log for TimeXtender LogEngine events.

Select Open log file under Tools -> Options -> General tab. The log file tracelog.txt is created in the following folder upon deployment or execution of objects. C:\Users\<UserAccount>\AppData\Roaming\TimeXtender\TimeXtender Saas\<version>
